title: Top Laners?
body: What are some good top laners? I just realized the other day when I had to fill top that I have no idea who is in the meta in the top lane besides Illaoi and Garen. I know its a traditionally a tank, but who can be a good top laner? And are a lot of them junglers too (like Pantheon, Zac, etc)

replies.body:
I don't main top, so I wont go too in-depth here. But top lane is usually fairly brutal, and you need to either out duel or out sustain your opponent.

Here are some decent picks in the current meta:

+ **Tanks**: {{champion:54}} Malphite, {{champion:14}} Sion, {{champion:36}} Dr. Mundo, {{champion:106}} Volibear, {{champion:75}} Nasus, {{champion:86}} Garen, {{champion:44}} Taric

+ **Duelists**: {{champion:114}} Fiora, {{champion:77}} Udyr, {{champion:80}} Pantheon, {{champion:102}} Shyvanna, {{champion:23}} Tryndamere, {{champion:48}} Trundle

+ **Trolls**: {{champion:17}} Teemo, {{champion:27}} Singed

I'd recommend trying out the tanks first, since they are the easiest. Also keep in mind I left out lots of other good picks like {{champion:133}} Quinn just to keep it simple.

Hmmm... If you say Taric is decent top I'll try it, though I am bias towards him being useless. I am happy that I seem to own most of the champs mentioned except Fiora, Voli, and Trundle. Although how is Singed considered a troll?
Oh ahah, the troll section was just a joke. I put him there because he's super super annoying to lane against, especially when he begins to proxxy
Ah, so it's just he has an annoying feature to him, similar to Teemo shrooms.
Taric top? Interesting,i wanna try that sometime
It's very good in our elo. Make sure you take **Grasp of the Undying** though!
I remember trying to learn GP but I suck at using his barrels to farm and go horribly every time. Tahm doesn't appeal to me because of how OP he is. But I'll definitely try the others. Thanks bro.
Im not sure about the tactics or what is "traditionals", but I got experience from teemo(no kidding!), and it was pretty bad ... two teemos
Haha I'd play Teemo but I'm afraid that I would be corrupted by the power of ~~Satan~~ The Scout's Code and become toxic xD

Sion is a safe pick, easy to learn difficult to master. Also Garen, as soon as you learn to Q E you've mastered him. Pick Fiora if you want to make your lane opponent commit sudoku because of how easy she is to steamroll with.

Yeah I'll try him out. Thanks man

EDIT: Tried out Sion last night and stomped a Diana with him xD
